items.name: GenericFarewell
items.description: Safe travels, friend!

items.name: FormalDismissal
items.description: Good day to you.

items.name: WarmGoodbye
items.description: Take care! Come back and visit anytime!

items.name: GruffDismissal
items.description: Yeah, yeah. Off with you.

items.name: SuspiciousWarning
items.description: Watch yourself out there. Don't trust anyone.

items.name: EnthusiasticSendOff
items.description: Good luck on your adventures! May fortune smile upon you!

items.name: WearyDismissal
items.description: Go on then. I have work to do.

items.name: HumbleBid
items.description: May your journey be safe. Thank you for your time.

items.name: ArrogantDismissal
items.description: Yes, well, I trust you'll put my wisdom to good use.

items.name: ShyGoodbye
items.description: Um, goodbye... Be safe...

items.name: MysteriousParting
items.description: Until we meet again... perhaps in another life.

items.name: LoudFarewell
items.description: FAREWELL, BRAVE SOUL! GO FORTH AND CONQUER!

items.name: ShortDismissal
items.description: Goodbye.

items.name: WittyClosure
items.description: Don't die out there. It would be terribly inconvenient.

items.name: GuardedGoodbye
items.description: Leave now. And don't come back unless necessary.

items.name: ReligiousBlessing
items.description: May the gods protect you on your journey.

items.name: ScholarlyWish
items.description: Fascinating conversation! I hope you find what you seek.

items.name: MilitarySalute
items.description: Dismissed. Stay sharp out there, soldier.

items.name: MerchantPitch
items.description: Come back soon! I'll have new stock for you!

items.name: AppatheticWave
items.description: Whatever. Bye.

items.name: NobleFarewell
items.description: Fare thee well. I trust you'll conduct yourself honorably.

items.name: StreetWise
items.description: Watch your back out there. It's rough.

items.name: CompassionateWorry
items.description: Please be careful. The world is dangerous.

items.name: ImpatientShoo
items.description: Yes, yes, goodbye already!

items.name: PhilosophicalReflection
items.description: Every ending is a new beginning. Walk wisely.

items.name: DrunkWave
items.description: *hic* Sheee ya later, friend! *stumbles*

items.name: HopefulWish
items.description: I hope you defeat the bad guys! You can do it!

items.name: CynicalSmirk
items.description: Good luck with that. You'll need it.

items.name: VeteranRespect
items.description: Fight well. Die better, if it comes to that.

items.name: SecretiveNod
items.description: *winks* Remember what I told you... trust no one.

metadata.usage: Select farewell matching NPC's personality and prior interaction tone
